title: Textile, ca. 1961
medium:
Medium: nylon warp; acrylic and cotton wefts
Technique: plain weave with bands of plain weave with continuous supplementary wefts
inscribed: Attached label , " C tissu est constrit sur unu chaine en fils de NYLON fins ce qui rend necessaires des coutures a points serres avec bords largeset surjetes ou mieux des coutures anglaise . Repassage leger a fer tiede".
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 375.5 x 107 cm (12 ft. 3 13/16 in. x 42 1/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds
description: Bands of dense purple and orange alternate with shiny transparent bands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1961.Medium: nylon warp; acrylic and cotton wefts
Technique: plain weave with bands of plain weave with continuous supplementary wefts. Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds. 1991-90-2.
